”Alexa, open my psychedelic experience”

skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my psychedelic experience
des:
Listen to this Infotainment by Dr Bheemaiah, of VayuVaidya.
 "The information in this skill is provided for informational and educational purposes only and is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment, or diagnosis. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number."
VR Therapy or Virtual Reality Therapy, has been proven to have the highest rate of success in detoxification and deaddiction in alcoholism and substance abuse, commended as an alternative therapy, with success similar to MiCBT and mindfulness therapies, VR therapy has proven that psychedelic experiences could be therapeutic and free of substance use.
At any point, you can say "Alexa, stop" to exit the skill. This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
Suggested Readings:
https://news.vanderbilt.edu/2018/03/19/virtual-reality-world-offers-drug-addicts-low-risk-place-to-just-say-no/
Virtual Reality Therapy on Wikipedia, https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Virtual_reality_therapy
